title: 10 Effective Ways to Attract a Scorpio Woman (With Expert Tips)

steps.title: Be assertive, confident, and sincere to get her attention.
steps.content: Be assertive , confident , and sincere to get her attention. Women who identify as Scorpios are generally driven, self-assured, and in for the chase . They don’t want to waste time on someone shy, deceitful, or lacking confidence in themselves. She’ll be able to tell if you’re putting on a front, so start things off right by being yourself. [1] X Research source Being assertive doesn’t mean the same thing as being aggressive when flirting . You can be assertive by speaking confidently and standing behind what you believe.

steps.title: Take your time getting to know her.
steps.content: Take your time getting to know her. Eyedealism believes that if you come on strong with your romantic feelings, you risk pushing her away. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Lanyadoo notes that it can be hard to gain a Scorpio woman’s trust, so take the time to get to know her likes, dislikes, hobbies, and friends. [3] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. Try some of these fun ways to get to know her better: Pay attention to her social media to see what kinds of things she likes. Ask her open-ended questions to get her to talk about herself more. Try saying, “Tell me more,” to get her to share more personal information with you.

steps.title: Give her with thoughtful gifts and compliments.
steps.content: Give her with thoughtful gifts and compliments . Pay attention to what she likes and talks about to get gift ideas, says Lanyadoo. [4] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. When you pay her a compliment, make it specific—and, while you can compliment her looks, don’t neglect her intelligence, humor, and attitude, too. For example, if she mentions that she loves a specific coffee shop, stop by there and get her a gift card. Or, if she loves hitting the gym, get her a gift certificate for a massage or a new yoga mat. To compliment her sincerely, keep things specific. For example, instead of saying, “You look nice today,” say something like, “That color of green brings out your beautiful eye color.” Or tell her you admire something she accomplished recently, like running a marathon or acing a presentation at work.

steps.title: Avoid being clingy or controlling.
steps.content: Avoid being clingy or controlling . A Scorpio woman loves her independence, and astrologists say that a major turn-off is when someone tries to cramp her lifestyle. If you call or text her, try not to contact her again until she responds to you. If she turns down a date or says she’s busy, wait a week before trying again. Avoid telling her how she should act, dress, or deal with a situation unless she asks for your advice. [5] X Research source If she does ask for your help or opinion about something, that is a great sign and means she’s beginning to trust you.

steps.title: Be honest and loyal.
steps.content: Be honest and loyal. Otherwise, you risk losing her trust. While she may like a little bit of mystery, lying and dishonesty will turn her off for sure. Commit to telling the truth and acting in a trustworthy way—this means not having other relationships on the side or hiding anything from her. If you do lie about something, come clean before she catches you. For example, if you told her you quit smoking but haven’t, it’d be better to talk to her about the situation rather than have her find a pack of cigarettes in your pocket. Reader Poll: We asked 485 wikiHow readers who are Scorpios what's most important to them in a relationship, and 69% of them said loyalty . [Take Poll] If you want to win her heart, you'll have to prove that you're totally trustworthy.

steps.title: Keep her in the loop so she feels secure in your relationship.
steps.content: Keep her in the loop so she feels secure in your relationship. Astrologists say that Scorpio women , while fiercely independent, also like to feel secure in a relationship—in fact, that’s often why it takes them so long to settle down. If you like her, don’t play games by ignoring her texts or calls or being unavailable for long periods. Let her know she's a priority and that you won’t leave her hanging. [6] X Research source Like many women, Scorpio women don’t like games. When she likes you, she doesn’t want to question how important she is to you, so don’t make her.

steps.title: Respect her boundaries and encourage her interests.
steps.content: Respect her boundaries and encourage her interests. Lanyadoo notes that a great way to keep your relationship vibrant is to make sure she is taking the time she needs for herself. [7] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. If she feels stifled or bored, she may to grow to resent you. For example, if there is a class she wants to take, encourage her to register. If she loves going out with her friends on the weekend, don’t try to monopolize all of her time.

steps.title: Allow her to take the lead.
steps.content: Allow her to take the lead. Unless she gives you a signal that she wants you to take charge, it’ll help the balance in your relationship if you let her give advice and make decisions. This will show her that you respect her intelligence and value her leadership. [8] X Research source As she likes and trusts you more and more, chances are she’ll ask for your help with things. But if you try to take control of the relationship, she might withdraw from you.

steps.title: Experience new things together to keep things fresh.
steps.content: Experience new things together to keep things fresh. In addition to making sure she feels independent and challenged in her personal life, make sure you’re experiencing things together to help create a stronger bond. Take a cooking class together, travel somewhere new, join a book club, train for a triathlon, or do a home project. [9] X Research source Boredom and unvaried routine are bound to make her antsy. Every couple of weeks, come up with something new to do if you feel like things are getting a little too “normal.”

steps.title: Plan a date that embraces the spirit of adventure.
steps.content: Plan a date that embraces the spirit of adventure. Scorpio women love discovering new places, experiences, or activities that they see as edgy or super interesting. This doesn’t mean you have to plan a weekend getaway when you want to date a Scorpio; you can easily play tourist in your town by visiting unique attractions others don’t normally try. Better yet, explore without looking at your phone or using GPS to know where you’re going. Invite her to go out for a drink or meal so you can spend one-on-one time together. Appeal to her edgy side by planning a murder mystery dinner where she can dress up to match the characters in question; she’ll have a ball trying to figure out whodunit while getting to know you better. Have a drink at a local speakeasy that can transport her to the time of Prohibition. She’ll adore the sense of secrecy and exclusivity that transforms having a cocktail into a whole new experience. Test her mettle by challenging her to go skydiving with you. It’ll allow her to show off her sense of adventure and prove to be an exhilarating time.

steps.title: Take her somewhere exclusive that makes her feel special.
steps.content: Take her somewhere exclusive that makes her feel special. Whether the night involves a new bar, musical act, or attraction, Scorpios love being in the know before anyone else is. Take a chance on an edgy art exhibit, an avant-garde band, or a unique tasting menu, and watch her fall in love with you.

steps.title: Plan romantic surprises to sweep her off her feet.
steps.content: Plan romantic surprises to sweep her off her feet. A romantic weekend away, a dinner at a high-end restaurant, tickets to her favorite musical—grand gestures can go a long way in getting her to fall for you . Plus, taking a risk and planning something big shows her that you’re confident and willing to take charge sometimes. [10] X Research source Romantic surprises don’t have to be expensive. For example, if she is a book lover, surprise her by taking her to a reading by an author she loves. Or plan a special picnic lunch, complete with champagne.

steps.title: Get her adrenaline pumping with risk-taking activities.
steps.content: Get her adrenaline pumping with risk-taking activities. Scorpio women love dates that include a little danger, so think advanced hikes , roller coasters, and zip-lining. She’ll love embracing that feeling of excitement that only comes with physically charged, adventurous activities. She’ll end up telling all her friends about how she rocked that mountain climbing , white water rafting, or off- road biking escapade.

steps.title: Appeal to her love of all things luxurious.
steps.content: Appeal to her love of all things luxurious. Treat your female Scorpio right by indulging in a spa day or a weekend at a cabin where she can soak in a hot tub with a glass of champagne. Other dates can focus on a shopping spree or a tasting menu at a trendy restaurant. Romantic touches, like taking her for a horse-drawn carriage ride, will only add to her enjoyment of the date.

steps.title: Scorpio women are known for having a seriously strong libido.
steps.content: Scorpio women are known for having a seriously strong libido. They’re very focused on sex itself and will want to enjoy lots of intimate time with you, as long as you pay attention to them and treat them right. They’re turned on by everything they can imagine sexually, so be as open as they are to new ideas, kinks, and experiences; it’ll keep the seduction interesting enough for them going forward.

steps.title: Female Scorpios don’t like the idea of being a friend with benefits.
steps.content: Female Scorpios don’t like the idea of being a friend with benefits. They’re very emotionally invested in a physical relationship and become quite attached. If you’re keeping them to the side and not completely focused on your intimate relationship, you risk losing them. Scorpios also don’t kiss and tell, so if you share any information about being intimate with them, they’re liable to feel betrayed.

steps.title: Intuitive
steps.content: Intuitive They often know what you’re thinking before you say it. No matter what your mood is, Scorpios have a great sense of intuition, and they’re sure to use it to show you how well they understand and empathize with you.

steps.title: Loyal
steps.content: Loyal They’re not great at surface-level relations and crave connections that are built on meaningful foundations. It’s not always an easy relationship, but you’ll find your Scorpio woman nothing short of exhilarating.

steps.title: Focused
steps.content: Focused Whether it’s work, passions, or people in her life, a Scorpio female is focused and unstoppable. If you’re lucky enough to be her partner, she’ll do anything for you and prove her loyalty again and again.

steps.title: Emotional
steps.content: Emotional While it can be thrilling to be in a relationship with them, their intense nature may have you wishing that they took a step back sometimes. It can be exhausting dealing with the many emotions a Scorpio has at their fingertips, so have patience with them whenever possible.

steps.title: Prone to jealousy
steps.content: Prone to jealousy Scorpio women love so deeply that their grip on you may feel somewhat tight at times; they’re not clingy, but just super zealous. It can be difficult to get used to this level of dedication, which means you’ll have to adjust if you’re not equally as fervent. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Scorpio is most compatible with Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn, Cancer, and Pisces.
steps.content: Scorpio is most compatible with Taurus , Virgo, Capricorn, Cancer , and Pisces. They typically have an easier time with other water signs, who are known for emotional depth and sensitivity, and grounded, reliable earth signs. Generally, top matches for Scorpio include: [12] X Research source Taurus: Sister signs who share a deep and sensual bond. Virgo : Virgo’s practicality balances out Scorpio’s intensity. Capricorn : Mutual respect and ambition form a deep, stable relationship. Cancer: They have a shared love of emotional security and loyalty. Pisces : Deeply emotional and intuitive signs make for a supportive bond.

steps.title: Scorpio is least compatible with Gemini, Libra, Aquarius, Aries, Leo, and Sagittarius.
steps.content: Scorpio is least compatible with Gemini , Libra, Aquarius , Aries, Leo , and Sagittarius. Scorpios have a much more difficult time forming lasting romantic relationships with air signs, who are social, curious, and analytical; they also struggle with fire signs, known for being overly passionate, impulsive, and impatient. Generally, the worst matches for Scorpio include: [13] X Research source Gemini: Serious Scorpios clash with Gemini’s adaptable nature. Libra : Scorpios often disrupt Libra’s desire for harmony. Aquarius: Aquarius isn’t emotionally giving enough and craves alone time. Aries : It leads to power struggles since Aries is too impulsive. Leo: Both are strong-willed and find it hard to compromise. Sagittarius : Difficult reconciling differences between intimacy and freedom.

steps.title: Scorpios are born between October 23 and November 21.
steps.content: Scorpios are born between October 23 and November 21. They’re a water sign associated with passion, intensity, and emotional depth. Their symbol is a scorpion, while their ruling planets are Mars and Pluto, which are linked with transformation and a deep sense of the unconscious. Birthstone: Topaz Flower: Geraniums, marigolds, and peonies. Color: Red, black, and maroon. Lucky numbers: 1, 2, 4, and 7.
